text: Statuettes of Santa Muerte (Holy Death) are displayed for sale at a sanctuary in Santa Maria Cuautepec, Tultitlan, Mexico. When Pope Francis arrives in Mexico for a five-day visit on Friday, he will find a country where devotion to this ‘Saint of Death’ is growing fast despite the Vatican’s rejection of the figure as blasphemous.— Photo: AFP
title: Mexico’s new religious movement
